summary: The meeting focused on the design of the hotel market data model and strategies for data sourcing. It was decided to change the term 'growth rate' to 'YoY' and to include both a Market and Comp set in the model. There was a discussion on whether the data should be user input or automated, and the sources for market data and comp set data were identified.
decisions: Include a Market and Comp set in the data model.
Use market data from LARC and comp set data from STR or clients.

items.title: Update terminology in data model
items.details: Change 'growth rate' to 'YoY' in the hotel market data model.

items.title: Define Market and Comp set requirements
items.details: Determine if the Market and Comp set data will be user input or automated.

items.title: Source market data
items.details: Gather market data from LARC as identified in the meeting.

items.title: Source comp set data
items.details: Collect comp set data from STR and explore client data options.
